Fall_River.St. Louis Church (Fall River, Massachuse:
Fall River is a city in Bristol County, Massachusetts, United States. Fall River's population was 87,103 at the 2010 census, making it the tenth-largest city in the state.
Located along the eastern shore of Mount Hope Bay at the mouth of the Taunton River, the city became famous during the 19th century as the leading textile manufacturing center in the United States.
